card_text: Target 1 "Junk Warrior" you control; if it battles an opponent's monster this turn while you control it, apply these effects.$N●Your opponent cannot activate cards or effects until the end of the Damage Step.$N●If it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent.$N●Double any battle damage your opponent takes.$N●It cannot be destroyed by battle.$N●Destroy the opponent's monster that battled it at the end of the Damage Step.
